title: Om shiva SaNmukha
sahitya:
Om shiva SaNmukha Om enrE anudinam nAma japam shei manamE


anupallavi

  sAmimalaiyil vAzhum sadguru paramAtman kSEmam aLippAn enrum nEma niSTaiyuDanE


caraNam    nAlu vEdap-poruLum nAlu kavit-tiranum nAlu puruSArthamum nalgi anbaraik-kAppAn
bAlasubrahmaNyan kOla vaDivai eNNi bhakti paravashattAl citta shuddhiyuDanE
